pullrequest.title: Fix circular dependency between physics and sensors (issue #1516)

content.raw:
It does not fit well to get it into our logic of DSL job generation, since -any- jobs are generated for the default CI distro (Trusty in this case).

What it is really easy is to copy the trusty job and just change the distribution from the jenkins GUI. I've done that and schedule this branch:
http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-wily-amd64-gpu-none_temp/
content.html:
It does not fit well to get it into our logic of DSL job generation, since -any- jobs are generated for the default CI distro (Trusty in this case).

What it is really easy is to copy the trusty job and just change the distribution from the jenkins GUI. I've done that and schedule this branch: http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-wily-amd64-gpu-none_temp/
